content: While the Roomba 980 is iRobot's best vacuum yet , the 960 isn't too far behind. And when this thing goes on sale, people can not get enough of it. (Case in point: When we wrote about this deal on the 960 ahead of Black Friday , it was one of the most popular posts we did all week.) People love deals on robot vacuums. And it's a good thing too, since here's another one: The iRobot Roomba 960 is on sale for $449.99 right now, which is $250 off the original $699.99 price and almost as good as it's Black Friday price. The 960 features iRobot's iAdapt 2.0 Navigation with Visual Localization to easily maneuver and clean an entire floor of your home. And since it works on both hardwood and rugs, you shouldn't have to worry about it transitioning from one room to the next.. The vacuum packs plenty of power for the size and its AeroForce filter can help combat allergens like dirt, dust, pet hair, and pollen, as well as all the other crumbs and daily debris that pile up on your floors. The 960 is smart home ready as well. You can connect to it through the Roomba app to set a cleaning schedule and see where it has cleaned whether you're home or out. And if you have an Amazon Alexa or Google Home device, you can pair up the 960 to control it while you catch up on the rest of your chores (or kick back and see what's new on Netflix — we won't tell). Image: iRobot iRobot Roomba 960 — $449.99 See Details

By Kevin BillingsMashable Deals2018-12-12 21:35:16 UTC

While the Roomba 980 is iRobot's best vacuum yet, the 960 isn't too far behind. And when this thing goes on sale, people can not get enough of it. (Case in point: When we wrote about this deal on the 960 ahead of Black Friday, it was one of the most popular posts we did all week.)

People love deals on robot vacuums. And it's a good thing too, since here's another one: The iRobot Roomba 960 is on sale for $449.99 right now, which is $250 off the original $699.99 price and almost as good as it's Black Friday price.

The 960 features iRobot's iAdapt 2.0 Navigation with Visual Localization to easily maneuver and clean an entire floor of your home. And since it works on both hardwood and rugs, you shouldn't have to worry about it transitioning from one room to the next..

The vacuum packs plenty of power for the size and its AeroForce filter can help combat allergens like dirt, dust, pet hair, and pollen, as well as all the other crumbs and daily debris that pile up on your floors.

The 960 is smart home ready as well. You can connect to it through the Roomba app to set a cleaning schedule and see where it has cleaned whether you're home or out. And if you have an Amazon Alexa or Google Home device, you can pair up the 960 to control it while you catch up on the rest of your chores (or kick back and see what's new on Netflix — we won't tell).
